meanings.definition: Treat (someone) in an indulgent or overprotective way.
meanings.sent1: She mollycoddled her pet cat by giving it treats all day.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family mollycoddled their only child, never letting them do any chores.
meanings.sent3: The queen mollycoddled her royal dog with a golden crown and velvet bed.
meanings.sent4: The coach mollycoddled the star player, always giving them special treatment.
meanings.sent5: The teacher mollycoddled the student, allowing them to skip homework every day.

meanings.sent1: He mollycoddled himself with a bubble bath and chocolates after a long day.
meanings.sent2: The grandparents mollycoddled their grandchild with toys and sweets.
meanings.sent3: The chef mollycoddled the customer by adding extra cheese to their pizza.
meanings.sent4: The spa mollycoddled its clients with massages and facials.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity mollycoddled their assistant, fulfilling every request immediately.
